p: To confirm this idea, we used a mini-replicon system-based approach to identify the target sequence of NP for eqMx1. We swapped expression plasmids between the different strains H7N9 ZJ13 and H3N8 JL89 to determine whether an Mx1-sensitive mini-replicon system could be converted into a more resistant system and vice versa ( Figure 3A). The replacement PB1, PB2, or PA from H3N8 JL89 into H7N9 ZJ13, did not change the polymerase activity of the re-assorted complex to a large extent. However, the replacement by H3N8 JL89 NP resulted in a complete reversal of the polymerase activity of H7N9 ZJ13 equivalent to the actual H3N8 JL89 polymerase system ( Figure 3B). Thus, our approach identified the IAV NP as a possible target of eqMx1.
